Class RpnEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • RpnEvaluator

  • public class RpnEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the reading in and handling of RPN fractions Takes input as fraction1, fraction2, operator Adds the fractions to a stack, removes 2 fractions from the stack when an operator is found. Adds the result back to the stack and also to a queue of intermediate fractions.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Handles reading in of fraction equations by calling readIn. Prints out a normal termination line.

      • ProcessToken

        public void ProcessToken(java.lang.String tok)
        Processes one token. Keeps track of the validity of the expression.
        Parameters:
        tok - the token being processed

      • ProcessToken

        public void ProcessToken()
        Checks if there is still a token to be processed. If not then the expression is checked for validity before flagging it as done. Stores the answer.
